title: Why does Fiora exist?
body:
I think that {{champion:114}}  is an unfair champion and if you do not have her on your team, you are {{champion:86}} teed to lose.
I strongly suggest to Rito Games® that she be deleted, I feel as though with her deletion their will be a greater amount of positive games with less toxicity and flaming.

Thank yo for listening I look forward to the next patch when she is deleted.

replies.body:
I think that {{champion:17}} is an unfair champion and if you do not have her on your team, you are {{champion:86}} teed to lose.
I strongly suggest to Rito Games® that she be deleted, I feel as though with her deletion their will be a greater amount of positive games with less toxicity and flaming.

Thank yo for listening I look forward to the next patch when she is deleted.

Seriously, though, if Riot decided to delete a champion every time one person said to, we'd literally have no champions to play with. Additionally, this doesn't belong on the help and support boards, go to gameplay and strategy.
